Reports: Online classes require a lot of self-discipline and time management skills that not all students have developed yet.
Resolution: Offer workshops on time management and self-discipline to help students succeed in online classes.

Reports: It is difficult to build relationships with classmates and professors in an online setting.
Resolution: Create virtual networking events and discussion forums to help students build relationships with classmates and professors.

Reports: The quality of education in online classes is not the same as in-person classes, and it can be frustrating to pay full tuition for a lesser experience.
Resolution: Improve the quality of online classes by incorporating interactive and engaging teaching methods.

Reports: The lack of access to campus resources and facilities is a major downside to online classes.
Resolution: Provide online students with access to digital library resources and virtual student support services.

Reports: The time difference for international students can make it difficult to attend online classes and participate in group projects.
Resolution: Offer flexible class schedules and recorded lectures to accommodate students in different time zones.

Reports: The lack of face-to-face interaction in online classes makes it hard to ask questions and receive feedback.
Resolution: Increase professor availability during online classes and provide additional support through teaching assistants.

Reports: The online format can be especially challenging for hands-on courses like art, music, and lab-based sciences.
Resolution: Develop virtual simulations and interactive tools to help students in hands-on courses succeed in an online format.

Reports: Limited access to technical resources and software can hinder the learning experience in online classes.
Resolution: Provide online students with access to necessary technical resources and software.

Reports: It is challenging to maintain focus and avoid distractions during online classes, especially for students living in crowded or noisy environments.
Resolution: Offer workshops on focus and productivity to help students succeed in online classes.

Reports: The increased screen time from online classes can cause eye strain and fatigue.
Resolution: Provide resources and tips on managing screen time and reducing eye strain for online students.

Reports: Online exams and assessments can be more challenging and stressful than in-person tests.
Resolution: Offer practice exams and stress management workshops to help students prepare for online assessments.

Reports: It is difficult to stay motivated and accountable for completing online coursework without the structure of in-person classes.
Resolution: Introduce virtual study groups and peer support networks to help students stay motivated and accountable.

Reports: Online classes can exacerbate feelings of isolation and loneliness for students who struggle to make connections with peers.
Resolution: Create virtual social events and online communities to help students feel more connected to their peers.

Reports: Technical difficulties with online exams and quizzes can lead to anxiety and frustration.
Resolution: Provide technical support and resources to help students overcome technical difficulties during online exams.

Reports: The lack of access to professors during online classes can make it difficult to receive help and feedback on coursework.
Resolution: Increase professor availability during online classes and provide additional support through teaching assistants.

Reports: Online classes can make it harder to balance academic responsibilities with work or family obligations.
Resolution: Offer flexible class schedules and recorded lectures to help students balance academic responsibilities with other commitments.

Reports: Limited access to internships and job opportunities for online students can hinder their career prospects.
Resolution: Expand virtual internship and job opportunities for online students to ensure they have equal access to career development resources.

Reports: The lack of networking opportunities and professional development events for online students can be a major drawback.
Resolution: Organize virtual networking events and professional development workshops for online students.

Reports: The online format can make it challenging to participate in extracurricular activities and clubs.
Resolution: Create virtual extracurricular activities and clubs to help online students stay engaged and connected.

Reports: Online classes can create a sense of disconnection from the campus community and culture.
Resolution: Create virtual campus tours and online events to help online students feel more connected to the campus community.

Reports: It is harder to form study groups and collaborate with classmates in an online setting.
Resolution: Introduce virtual study groups and collaboration tools to help students work together effectively.

Reports: Technical difficulties with online class recordings can lead to missed lectures and important information.
Resolution: Provide technical support and resources to help students access online class recordings and stay on track with coursework.

Reports: The lack of access to campus facilities like libraries and study spaces can make it harder to study and complete coursework.
Resolution: Provide online students with access to digital library resources and virtual study spaces.

Reports: Online classes can be particularly challenging for students who need hands-on assistance from professors or peers.
Resolution: Increase professor availability during online classes and provide additional support through teaching assistants.

Reports: The lack of in-person support and resources for mental health and wellness can make online classes particularly difficult for some students.
Resolution: Expand virtual mental health and wellness resources for online students, including counseling and support groups.

Reports: The lack of access to campus events and activities can make the college experience feel incomplete for online students.
Resolution: Create virtual campus events and activities to help online students feel more connected to the college experience.

Reports: The limited availability of online courses and programs can make it difficult for students to meet graduation requirements or pursue specific fields of study.
Resolution: Expand the availability of online courses and programs to ensure students can meet graduation requirements and pursue their desired fields of study.
